args.query: commutative ring is field iff units equals nonzero elements R^× = R \ {0}

result: {"ok": true, "results": [{"id": 300854, "informal_statement": "For a commutative ring \\(R\\) with characteristic \\(n \\in \\mathbb{N}\\), and an ideal \\(I\\) of \\(R\\), the statement that for all natural numbers \\(x\\), if \\(x\\) cast into \\(R\\) lies in \\(I\\), then \\(x\\) cast into \\(R\\) equals \\(0\\), is equivalent to the comapped ideal of \\(I\\) under the natural number ring homomorphism being contained in the comapped zero ideal under the same homomorphism.", "formal_statement"

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

theorem field_iff_units_eq_nonzero {R : Type*} [CommRing R] : Field R ↔ Set.range (coe : Rˣ → R) = {x : R | x ≠ 0} := by sorry
